preferences.description: Always convert digits to ASCII format
preferences.name: preferASCIIDigits
preferences.title: Prefer ASCII Digits

author: mohancloudworld
description: A text converter (not translator) from an Indian language to English and vice versa. Supports Devanagari (Sanskrit/Hindi/Marathi), Telugu, Kannada, Gujarati, Tamil, Bengali, Gurmukhi (Punjabi), Malayalam and Oriya (Odia).
name: parivartan
